response.overview: The latest DTS Demo Disc from the CES Show in Vegas 2020. This is Volume 24 from the series. Contains the latest Movie Clips on 4k UHD HDR and DTS:X, DTS-HD MA 7.1 and DTS Headphone:X audio. Also include test tools DTS Callout 7.14 and 5.1.4.  Content:  Apollo 13  Wolf Warrior 2  SYML  Clean Eyes  The Scorpion King  Recycled Sound  Hellboy II: The Golden Army  SYML  Wildfire  Backdraft  SHDADOW  A Different Perspective  Hot Fuzz  Westworld  Hulk  SYML  WDWGILY  Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days  Old Sea Brigade  Hope  Tests:  DTS Callout 7.1.4  DTS Callout 5.1.4
response.title: DTS BLU-RAY MUSIC DEMO DISC 24

results.name: Clip from 2020 DTS Demo Disc Volume 24
